column1: Pyinmana (Burmese: ပျဉ်းမနားမြို့; MLCTS: Khit _Sem
column3: 000 (2006 estimate)) is a logging town and sugarcane refinery center in the Naypyidaw Union Territory of Myanmar. The administrative capital of Myanmar was officially moved to a militarized greenfield site (which the leader

column2: Pyinmana was the base of the Burma Independence Army (later renamed and reorganized into the Burma Defence Army by the Japanese).
